title: Terrific Spot
text: Wanted to drop a note to say what a nice place this hotel is. Great employees, very helpful and welcoming. Room was very nice, big enough, nice bathroom, great view and great maid service. Breakfast every morning on each floor includes fruit, breads, muffins and danish's, coffee, juices, open bar with light snacks every nite. What else do you want? Would definately return there. Convenient to walk to all of downtown attractions including Miracle Mile.Nice place.
